sentences.english: King of Sweden hands each winner a  diploma and a  medal.
sentences.chinese: 由瑞士國王親手將證書和獎章授予獲獎者。

sentences.english: That is the animation of this medallion.
sentences.chinese: 這正是這個獎章的活力所在。

sentences.english: Black vitreous enamel plant production, has received medals of Panama International Fair.
sentences.chinese: 該廠產的黑釉瓷，曾獲得巴拿馬國際博覽會獎章。

sentences.english: Eventually, Mr. Crowley said, he would like to work with businesses on sponsored badges.
sentences.chinese: 克羅雷說最終他們將與企業在“贊助獎章”上合作。

sentences.english: Medal of Distinction, D. C. Superior Court 2000.
sentences.chinese: 的區別，區高級法院2000年獎章。

sentences.english: He won a medal for gallantry .
sentences.chinese: 他因勇敢而得了一枚獎章。

sentences.english: He has won a gold medal.
sentences.chinese: 他獲得了一枚金質獎章。

sentences.english: The gold medal was given to Mr. Brown for his fine show of vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生因其優異的蔬菜展覽而獲得金質獎章。

sentences.english: He won the Congressional Gold Medal two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 兩年前，榮獲國會金質獎章。

sentences.english: I hereby approve the applicant for The Venture Scout Award.
sentences.chinese: 茲批准申請人獲深資童軍獎章。

sentences.english: A medal was awarded to him for his good conduct.
sentences.chinese: 他因品行優良被授予獎章。

sentences.english: Maya Lin was awarded a 2009 National Medal of Arts.
sentences.chinese: 林瓔榮獲2009年度美國國家藝術獎章。

sentences.english: His credits include blockbuster films Gen- X Cops and The Medallion.
sentences.chinese: 他的作品包括重量級作品根X警察和獎章。

sentences.english: He was posthumously awarded a Silver Star.
sentences.chinese: 他死後得到了銀質獎章。

sentences.english: Professional photographer Lord Snowdon won its Hood Medal in 1978.
sentences.chinese: 專業攝影師斯諾頓勳爵在1978年獲得了胡德獎章。

sentences.english: The soldier was awarded a medal for his bravery.
sentences.chinese: 那個士兵因勇敢而被授予一枚獎章。

definition: special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)

pinyin: rong2 yu4 bo2 shi4 xue2 wei4

definition: to promulgate/to send out/to issue/to grant or confer
to determine the recipient of an award through discussion
